Splunk | Frontend Engineer | San Francisco, CA | ONSITE | Full-time | Benefits + Equity [0]

My team at Splunk is currently looking for frontend engineers of all experience levels to help build tools & user interfaces to analyze and extract insights from data utilizing state of the art frontend technologies.

Sounds interesting? Read more:

http://bit.ly/frontend-at-splunk

Feel free to ping me at pwied at company name .com (add HN to the subject) if you have any questions
